UserPictureSyncAgent(8) System Manager's Manual UserPictureSyncAgent(8)

NAME

UserPictureSyncAgent —
Agent for synchronizing user picture between user record and Me card in Contacts.

SYNOPSIS

UserPictureSyncAgent

DESCRIPTION

UserPictureSyncAgent is responsible for synchronizing the user picture between the user record and the Me card in Contacts.

There are no configuration options. Users should not run UserPictureSyncAgent manually.

March 12, 2021 macOS
